title: Best Salsa with Main Dishes: Get in Tune with The Taste of Mexico In More Ways Than One
description: SALSAS â€“ they taste so good; it feels like a dance in your mouth. This Mexican rooted food is the perfect accompaniment to any main. While salsas are associated with tortilla chips and tacos, they pair well with poultry, beef, pork, veal, seafood, and vegetables. Whether you are roasting, baking, grilling, boiling, broiling, or frying, there is always a salsa to take your taste buds on a journey.
author: Ava Archer
